json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Initial project specifications have been received for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} and are being reviewed by our team for {{CLIENT_NAME}}.

Please upload your project documents if you haven't already. Once that is completed we will email you when your project proposal is ready in {{EST_TIME}}.
json_agg.modalClient: New project {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} successfully created. Please upload project documents.
json_agg.clientStatusAction: Please upload your project documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} to continue. {{PROJECT_LINK?status=documents}}
json_agg.adminEmailContent: Initial project specifications have been received for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} for{{PROJECT_COMPANY_NAME}}.
json_agg.adminStatusAction: {{CLIENT_NAME}} has not finished uploading project documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}.{{PROJECT_LINK?status=documents}}

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
We are currently generating a detailed proposal for {{CLIENT_NAME}}'s new project at {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} based on the specifications provided.
json_agg.modalAdmin: Project documents successfully uploaded. Email sent to {{CLIENT_EMAIL}} notifying them that a proposal for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} will be ready in {{EST_TIME}}.
json_agg.modalClient: Project documents successfully uploaded. Proposal for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} will be ready in {{EST_TIME}}.
json_agg.adminEmailContent: Please begin generating a proposal for {{PROJECT_COMPANY_NAME}}'s new project at{{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} based on the specifications provided.

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Proposal for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} has been completed.

Please login into your dashboard to approve or request edit(s).
json_agg.modalAdmin: Proposal notification for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} successfully sent to {{CLIENT_EMAIL}}.
json_agg.clientStatusAction: Please accept or request edit(s) to the proposal for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. {{PROJECT_LINK?status=proposal}}
json_agg.adminEmailContent: Proposal for {{PROJECT_COMPANY_NAME}}'s project at {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} has been completed and sent to {{CLIENT_EMAIL}}.

json_agg.clientStatusAction: Please accept or request edit(s) to the proposal for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. {{PROJECT_LINK?status=proposal}}
Please accept or request edit(s) to the proposal for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. {{PROJECT_LINK?status=proposal}}

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Thank you for accepting the proposal for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}.
json_agg.modalClient: Thank you for accepting our proposal for <b>{{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}<b>.
json_agg.adminEmailContent: Proposal for {{PROJECT_COMPANY_NAME}}'s project at {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} has been accepted.

json_agg.modalClient: Contract Signed Successfully for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. A copy has been sent to {{CLIENT_EMAIL}}.
json_agg.adminEmailContent: Contract for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} has been signed by {{CLIENT_NAME}}.

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
The deposit invoice for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} is ready. Soon as payment as received CAPCo will begin generating your project files.
json_agg.modalAdmin: Deposit notification email for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} sent to {{CLIENT_EMAIL}}.

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Deposit has been successfully paid for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. {{GLOBAL_COMPANY_NAME}} will email you in {{PROJECT_EST_TIME}} with your project documents for review.

Thank you for your business!
json_agg.modalClient: Deposit successfully paid for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. You will be emailed at {{CLIENT_EMAIL}} in {{PROJECT_EST_TIME}} when your project documents for available review.
json_agg.adminEmailContent: Deposit paid for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} by {{CLIENT_NAME}}. Begin work on deliverables ASAP.
json_agg.adminStatusAction: Deposit has been submit for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. Please submit documents to {{PROJECT_LINK?status=documents}}

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
We are preparing detailed submittal documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. You will be notified in {{EST_TIME}}.
json_agg.adminStatusAction: Deposit has been submit for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. Please submit documents to {{PROJECT_LINK?status=documents}}

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Your submittal documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} have been completed and sent for review.
json_agg.modalAdmin: Documents ready email for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} successfully sent to {{CLIENT_EMAIL}}.generateProposal
json_agg.clientStatusAction: Approve or request edit(s) to documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}.{{PROJECT_LINK?status=final-documents}}
Approve or request edit(s) to documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}.{{PROJECT_LINK?status=final-documents}}
Approve or request edit(s) to documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}.{{PROJECT_LINK?status=final-documents}}
json_agg.nagEmailClient:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
We can see you have viewed the submittals. Please let us know if you have any questions.

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Thank you for signing off on the submittals for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. Your final documents will be delivered in {{PROJECT_EST_TIME}}.

{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
The final invoice has been generated for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. Please review and process payment through your project dashboard.
json_agg.adminEmailContent: Final invoice has been sent to {{CLIENT_NAME}} for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}.

json_agg.nagEmailClient:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
We can see you have viewed the final invoice. Please let us know if you have any questions.

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Thank you for the final payment for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}. Preparation of your final documents has commenced.
json_agg.clientStatusAction: {{GLOBAL_COMPANY_NAME}} is stamping your final documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}.
json_agg.adminEmailContent: Final invoice paid for{{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} by {{CLIENT_NAME}}. Please prepare final documents in {{EST_TIME}} or less.

json_agg.clientStatusAction: {{GLOBAL_COMPANY_NAME}} is stamping your final documents for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}}.

json_agg.clientEmailContent:
{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Your final project deliverables for {{PROJECT_ADDRESS}} have been completed and are available for download in your dashboard.

{{CLIENT_FIRST_NAME}} {{CLIENT_LAST_NAME}}
Congratulations! Your project has been successfully completed. Thank you for choosing {{GLOBAL_COMPANY_NAME}}.
